greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular array R by antidiagonals: label each unit square in the first quadrant lattice by its northeast vertex (x,y) and mark those having x+y=1(mod 3); then R(m,n) is the number of marked unit squares in the rectangle [0,m]x[0,n].
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 06 2008
